mapper.sql: id, user_id, business_id, reviews_msg, creator, gmt_create, is_deleted, remark, fid, pic_ids, plan_id, house_id, supply_demand_publisher_id, plan_type, is_read, is_top
mapper.select:
select u2.* from user_reviews u1 , user_reviews u2 where u1.business_id = u2.business_id
and u1.id = #{id} and u2.is_deleted = 0 order by u2.is_top desc, u2.gmt_create desc limit 1;
